title: Halal ban row: Bommai directs all SPs, DCs to be vigilant, 7 held - Daijiworld.com
content:
1. Halal ban row: Bommai directs all SPs, DCs to be vigilant, 7 held  Daijiworld.com
  2. Hindu groups call for boycott of Halal meat in Karnataka  The News Minute
  3. Halal Row: K'taka Animal Husbandry Dept Asks BBMP to Enforce Compulsory Stunning of Animals in Meat Shops  News18
  4. Halal Row: Karnataka CM Directs SPs, DCs To Be Vigilant Amid Ugadi Festivities  The Quint
  5. Is the campaign against halal meat a sign of bigotry?  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description:
Bengaluru, Apr 2 (IANS): Halal ban controversy in Karnataka has taken a serious turn in the state. Chief Minister Basavaraj Bommai on Saturday said that he has directed all Superintendents of Police (SP) and Deputy Commissioners to initiate strict action against elements who try to create problems during the festival.
.....
